titleInfo.title: Risk premia in banking and the macroeconomy

mods.abstract: This paper discusses the relationship between premia for macroeconomic risk in banking, aggregate behavior, and banking crises. We consider a competitive banking system embedded in an overlapping generation model subject to repeated macroeconomic shocks. We highlight how risk premia decline when bank equity decreases and identify potential vicious circles that may lead to banking crises.
